textSections: In order to view an NFT you have collected, go to the Collection tab. There you will see all of the NFTs that you have claimed while using the App.
The NFTs will consist of an image and AI generated flavor text along with the data about where you found it.
You also have the option to view the NFTs on OpenSea, an NFT marketplace that allows you to sell NFTs you collect as well as purchase NFTs from other users.
